channel.title: Projects on Data Analysis & Economic Cybernetics
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Data Analysis & Economic Cybernetics

item.title: Dissertation: Bayesian Inference and Forecasting with applications in microeconometrics and business
item.description: A Bayesian Hierarchical Model for TV Attribution, Hidden Markov Model for panel customer data, Forecasting demand for new products and short time series

item.title: Probabilistic Dynamic Modeling
item.description: Dynamics Linear and Nonlinear Models. Stochastic Filtering Institute of Mathematics' of Romanian Academy Research Group

item.title: Time Series Clustering
item.description: Bizovi Mihai and Jumanazar Gurbanov on Dynamic Time Wraping. Exploration of R Implementations

item.title: Thesis: Stochastic Modeling and Bayesian Inference
item.description: A synthesis of three perspectives: Stochastic Modeling, Machine Learning and Bayesian Inference. Gaussian Processes and Mixture Models

item.title: New Economic Thinking for a Knowledge-Based Society
item.description: Bizovi Mihai A critique of neoclassical economics and an exploration of models based on complexity science. With the support of dr. eng. Florin Munteanu.
